sqlMap.update: insert into user_card_consume(userId,regBindId,consumeCard,consumeNum,regTime) values(#userId#,#regBindId#,#consumeCard#,#consumeNum#,#regTime#) on duplicate key update consumeCard=#consumeCard#,consumeNum=consumeNum+#consumeNum#
insert into user_card_consume(userId,regBindId,consumeGold,regTime) values(#userId#,#regBindId#,#consumeGold#,#regTime#) on duplicate key update consumeGold=#consumeGold#

insert into log_group_table (dataDate,groupId,userGroup,gameType,bureau,userId,player2Count1,player2Count2,player2Count3,player3Count1,player3Count2,player3Count3,player4Count1,player4Count2,player4Count3,dyjCount) VALUES (#dataDate#,#groupId#,#userGroup#,#gameType#,#bureau#,#userId#,#player2Count1#,#player2Count2#,#player2Count3#,#player3Count1#,#player3Count2#,#player3Count3#,#player4Count1#,#player4Count2#,#player4Count3#,#dyjCount#) on duplicate key update player2Count1 = player2Count1 + #player2Count1#, player2Count2 = player2Count2 + #player2Count2#, player2Count3 = player2Count3 + #player2Count3#, player3Count1 = player3Count1 + #player3Count1#, player3Count2 = player3Count2 + #player3Count2#, player3Count3 = player3Count3 + #player3Count3#, player4Count1 = player4Count1 + #player4Count1#, player4Count2 = player4Count2 + #player4Count2#, player4Count3 = player4Count3 + #player4Count3#, dyjCount = dyjCount + #dyjCount#

insert into log_group_commission ( dataDate, groupId, userId, credit, commissionCredit, dyjCount,zjsCount, totalPay, commissionCount, selfWinCredit, selfCommissionCredit, selfDyjCount, selfZjsCount, selfTotalPay, selfCommissionCount ) VALUES ( #dataDate#, #groupId#, #userId#, #credit#, #commissionCredit#, #dyjCount#, #zjsCount#, #totalPay#, #commissionCount#, #selfWinCredit#, #selfCommissionCredit#, #selfDyjCount#, #selfZjsCount#, #selfTotalPay#, #selfCommissionCount# ) on duplicate key update credit = credit + #credit#, commissionCredit = commissionCredit + #commissionCredit#, commissionCount = commissionCount + #commissionCount#, dyjCount = dyjCount + #dyjCount#, zjsCount = zjsCount + #zjsCount#, totalPay = totalPay + #totalPay#, selfWinCredit = selfWinCredit + #selfWinCredit#, selfCommissionCredit = selfCommissionCredit + #selfCommissionCredit#, selfCommissionCount = selfCommissionCount + #selfCommissionCount#, selfDyjCount = selfDyjCount + #selfDyjCount#, selfZjsCount = selfZjsCount + #selfZjsCount#, selfTotalPay = selfTotalPay + #selfTotalPay#

insert into log_group_gold_table (`dataDate`,`groupId`,`configId`,`userId`,`playType`,`ticket`,`ticketCount`,`commission`,`commissionCount`) VALUES (#dataDate#,#groupId#,#configId#,#userId#,#playType#,#ticket#,#ticketCount#,#commission#,#commissionCount#) on duplicate key update ticket = ticket + #ticket#, ticketCount = ticketCount + #ticketCount#, commission = commission + #commission#, commissionCount = commissionCount + #commissionCount#

insert into log_group_gold_commission ( dataDate, groupId, userId, gold, commission, commissionCount, zjsCount, selfWin, selfCommission, selfCommissionCount, selfZjsCount ) VALUES ( #dataDate#, #groupId#, #userId#, #gold#, #commission#, #commissionCount#, #zjsCount#, #selfWin#, #selfCommission#, #selfCommissionCount#, #selfZjsCount# ) on duplicate key update gold = gold + #gold#, commission = commission + #commission#, commissionCount = commissionCount + #commissionCount#, zjsCount = zjsCount + #zjsCount#, selfWin = selfWin + #selfWin#, selfCommission = selfCommission + #selfCommission#, selfCommissionCount = selfCommissionCount + #selfCommissionCount#, selfZjsCount = selfZjsCount + #selfZjsCount#

insert into log_group_gold_win ( dataDate, groupId, userId, selfWin, selfJsCount ) VALUES ( #dataDate#, #groupId#, #userId#, #selfWin#, 1 ) on duplicate key update selfWin = selfWin + #selfWin#, selfJsCount = selfJsCount + 1
